Reviews.Title: not a good phone
Reviews.Author: Rhonda
Reviews.Content: we can't get the phone to work well wont send or recive messages or get phone calls. Was on the phone with tech support for over a hour and  we still dont have it working well. This phone has been wet befor and might be why it don't work like it should,

Reviews.Title: phone is great but old model
Reviews.Author: Francine Scott
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a Christmas present for my husband, it was his favorite phone since we went wireless years ago.  The reason for three stars is only because the phone is an older model, so the verizon backup wouldn't work on this phone, I had to take it  to a verizon store and have a technician download all my husband's information for me.  Other than that, it is a great phone

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: kristen
Reviews.Content: This is one of my favorite phones that I have had over the years.  It is light and compact and gives you dual functionality with a full keyboard for texting.
